description:
During my internship with Infosys, I contributed to a full-stack booking platform built with Next.js, FastAPI (Python), Redis, and PostgreSQL. I have led various backend-related developments in implementing secure authentication, rate limiting, and distributed microservices, thereby enhancing my skills in designing reliable, high-performance systems. I also got hands-on experience with CI/CD pipelines, test automation (Selenium), and Agile workflows while maintaining clean, maintainable, and well-documented code.

SDL's role in delivering high-end, advanced satellite and sensor systems for the Department of Defense and Intelligence Community really caught my attention. The potential to put my knowledge in object-oriented programming, either Python, C++, or Java, into practice, linking it to system reliability in a mission-critical environment, deeply motivates me. I am also convinced that my technical foundation, along with a teamwork mindset and commitment to excellence, should be an excellent fit for SDL's core values: collaboration and accountability.

I would welcome the opportunity to contribute to your team and to grow as a part of an organization committed to national security and technological innovation. Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the possibility of discussing how my skills and enthusiasm can support SDL's mission.
